Planning

This will eventually be moved to some other tool, but for now here are the initial thoughts.

  • Temporal data support - I don’t have an immediate need for it yet, but the infrastructure should support it eventually as that would be a key part in capturing data and performing operations based on facts at a given time.

  • Archiving support - Again my data at the beginning isn’t too big as of yet but eventually facilities would be needed for archiving the data

Last Published: 2015-10-04
Version: 1.0.5-SNAPSHOT
